thread.title: There's a BOGO Sale on NYX Cosmetics, and We're Freaking Out
thread.title_full: There's a BOGO Sale on NYX Cosmetics, and We're Freaking Out

author: Emily Orofino
title: There's a BOGO Sale on NYX Cosmetics, and We're Freaking Out
text:
NYX Cosmetics BOGO at Ulta | March 2017 There's a BOGO Sale on NYX Cosmetics, and We're Freaking Out February 28, 2017 by Emily Orofino 4 Shares A post shared by NYX Professional Makeup (@nyxcosmetics) on Feb 24, 2017 at 9:05am PST 
We have no qualms about spending copious amounts of money on NYX products. After all, they're so affordable, so we can't do too much financial damage. But Ulta Beauty recently revealed a sale that is positively dangerous to our wallets: a BOGO. 
Yes, that's right: for the purchase of one face or eye product from the brand, you can get one of equal or lesser value free. This deal is available in stores and online , and even better (or worse?), there doesn't seem to be any shopping restrictions, so you can really go hard on a beauty swag shopping spree. 
If you've been meaning to try the Away We Glow liquid highlighters or Total Control Foundation , now's your chance! Even better, you'll be able to take home some bonus items, too. Just know that this BOGO sale ends March 4, so you only have a few days to get your shop on.
